lead_paragraph: Republicans in the House of Representatives on Friday released another embarrassing U.S. Internal Revenue Service training video, this one a spoof of "The Apprentice" television program that shows IRS workers coming up with ideas to save money on conferences.

headline.main: IRS Training Video Spoofing 'Apprentice' Draws Republican Fire
headline.print_headline: IRS Training Video Spoofing 'Apprentice' Draws Republican Fire
